description: Protect your 11 Inch MacBook Air with the CaseCrown Book Cover Clip On Case. This lightweight case is a perfect match for your MacBook Air and fits snugly. It can be easily carried around as is or it can be slipped into a sleeve or backpack. Keep your case enclosed with the magnetic snap enclosure. The interior is lined with suede for easy comfort during use and to protect your MacBook Air from scratches. There are two corner elastic bands on the interior to securely hold your monitor to the case. There's a slot available to slide your MacBook Air in place as well. It even has a cut out for the trackpad so it's fully accessible. The back of the case has a durable flap that can be used for air circulation or provide a viewing angle during utilization. Only useable with MC968LL/A and MC969LL/A Models.
title: CaseCrown Elite Cover Case (Black) for Apple MacBook Air 11 Inch
